name: Puzzle Collection kids - Lite
description:
This is a Lite version and only has a part of the app. For a full experience get the complete version.

Now with HD Graphics and Voices!

Learning with Little Julen: Puzzles Collection.
Enjoy playing puzzles of Little Julen adventures: “Means of Transportation” and “ Animals of Africa”. There are 36 concepts for kids to learn.
Configure your puzzle with an easy editor and discover more than 280 possible combinations of puzzles.

These app include:
2 type of puzzle. (Jigsaw and Sliding).
4 difficulty levels.
36 unique images.

Languages: English, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Basque.
